channel.title: PimpRevived - Back to 2006 and beyond!
channel.description:
Well, I recently started my project and thought I might as well post a thread about it.
[center][IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/105sjec.png[/img]
[size=15pt]PimpRevived[/size] Back to 2006 and beyond!
[u][b]Goal[/b][/u] Create a server based off the old 'Pimpscape' server that we all loved while minimizing the few things about it that I didn't like [such as downtime]
[u][b]Why[/b][/u] I used to love playing servers such as 'SomeScape' and 'OwnzScape' where the few features they had were fun enough to keep me playing for weeks
[u][b]How[/b][/u] Using the base 'Pimpscape 2' by Alex (EnterEscecy i think) I will renovate some things such as combat, innefficient timers and such. I will work on and off when I can and am not bored.[/center]
Update Log [code]15-10-09 -- Started adding specials 16-10-09 -- Worked on adding a double hit using events (partially succeeded) 17-10-09 -- Integrated server with Shinto-Ken's max hit formula (not 100% working atm[/code]
Media [code]Specials and Double Hit: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o93EYYAoyy8[/code]
[center][b]CLICK IMAGE BELOW![/b] [URL=http://"http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/support.php?id=PimpRevived"][IMG]http://fiastechnology.110mb.com/support/image.php?id=PimpRevived[/img][/URL][/center]

item.title: PimpRevived - Back to 2006 and beyond!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Fritz Owner Fritz
item.description:
@Owner_Fritz wrote:

Well, I recently started my project and thought I might as well post a thread about it.

[center]

[size=15pt]PimpRevived[/size]
Back to 2006 and beyond!

Goal
Create a server based off the old ‘Pimpscape’ server that we all loved while minimizing the few things about it that I didn’t like [such as downtime]

Why
I used to love playing servers such as ‘SomeScape’ and ‘OwnzScape’ where the few features they had were fun enough to keep me playing for weeks

How
Using the base ‘Pimpscape 2’ by Alex (EnterEscecy i think) I will renovate some things such as combat, innefficient timers and such. I will work on and off when I can and am not bored.[/center]

Update Log

15-10-09 -- Started adding specials 16-10-09 -- Worked on adding a double hit using events (partially succeeded) 17-10-09 -- Integrated server with Shinto-Ken's max hit formula (not 100% working atm

Media

Specials and Double Hit: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o93EYYAoyy8
